column1: Kahalgaon Vidhan Sabha constituency is one of 243 legislative assemblies of Bihar. It is a part of the Bhagalpur lok sabha constituency along with other assembly constituencies: Gopalpur
Kahalgaon comprises CD Blocks Goradih & Sonhoula; Gram Panchayats Parashathdih (Shankarpur Khawas)

column5: Shyampur & Nagar Panchayat Kahalgaon of Kahalgaon CD Block.

column1: List of Assembly constituencies of Bihar
